name: A simple square
description:
A puzzle game, in which you will be able to go back in time.
The game offers 80 levels and 4 difficulty modes.
You will also have a creator of levels, with which in a few clicks you can create and share your levels with your friends and the comunity (A chanel on my discord is open for your shares: https://discord.gg/YAR6YZE)
I hope you would like this game that I liked doing.

---------------------

Made for the WeeklyGameJam 42 (Time Travel).
